sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Dropdown, Feed, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import AddTask from './AddTask' import FormTask from './FormTask' export default function ModalUpdateTask(props) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return ( <> } dimmer="inverted" size="tiny" closeIcon="close" > {props.headerTitle}
